Flow.description: 6/9 - AV - Removed, "Is the Injured Party Deceased?" this one isn't needed for the output, it's more for D&C's API. 6/9 - AV - Fixed facility type mapping and removed providers from the location text template since they'll show up after using their own template. 6/3 - AV - Made a few changes to PFAS based on changes we've made per partner firm's request. Used to generate the Questionnaire Output field for each Case Type
